Adaptablity.description: Boosts the power of the Pokémon's moves that match its type.

Blaze.description: Boosts the power of Fire-type moves when HP is low.

Damp.description: Prevents any explosions on the dungeon floor.

Guts.description: Boosts Attack if the Pokémon has any status problems.

No Guard.description: Allows Pokémon to ignore stat modifications to accuracy and evasion.

Overgrow.description: Boosts the power of Grass-type moves when HP is low.

Pick Up.description: Finds items if the Pokémon is not holding anything.

Rock Head.description: Prevents damage from the recoil of moves such as Take Down.

Run Away.description: Becomes terrified and flees when HP gets low. Leaders will resist this urge.

Torrent.description: Boosts the power of Water-type moves when HP is low.
